mapper.sql: id AS id, spu AS spu, image_url AS imageUrl, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product_image (id, spu, image_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
